text: The pasta was excellent and the service was very attentive.
translation: Die Pasta war ausgezeichnet und der Service war sehr aufmerksam.

text: The atmosphere was romantic but the food was disappointing.
translation: Die Atmosphäre war romantisch, aber das Essen war enttäuschend.
label: [{"aspect_term": "atmosphere", "aspect_category": "ambience general", "opinion_term": "romantic", "sentiment_polarity": "positive"}, {"aspect_term": "food", "aspect_category": "food quality", "opinion_term": "disappointing", "sentiment_polarity": "negative"}]

text: The pizza was decent and the wine selection was good.
translation: Die Pizza war anständig und die Weinauswahl war gut.

text: We waited over an hour for our table despite having a reservation.
translation: Wir warteten über eine Stunde auf unseren Tisch, obwohl wir eine Reservierung hatten.

text: The staff was incredibly rude and the music was way too loud.
translation: Das Personal war unglaublich unhöflich und die Musik war viel zu laut.

text: The dessert menu was extensive but the prices were reasonable.
translation: Die Dessertkarte war umfangreich, aber die Preise waren angemessen.

text: I loved the cozy ambiance and the friendly waitstaff.
translation: Ich liebte die gemütliche Atmosphäre und das freundliche Servicepersonal.

text: The restaurant was clean and well-maintained throughout.
translation: Das Restaurant war sauber und gut gepflegt.

text: Parking was convenient and the location was perfect.
translation: Das Parken war bequem und die Lage war perfekt.

text: The menu offered great variety for different dietary needs.
translation: Die Speisekarte bot große Vielfalt für verschiedene Ernährungsbedürfnisse.
